name: David and the Robots attack
description:
The Story

The Robots plans an attack to rule over the world

Try to stop the robots attack

Will you succeed to save humanity ?

The Controls

- Arrows key to move

- Down arrow to shoot

Credits

I've made all the musics in the game except the tittle screen music, it's DraxyDow which made it, thanks to him  (Go see his  soundcloud https://soundcloud.com/draxydow and his YouTube https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCioavwhpTPxUcfFIdrg3nWQ )
